column1: Hevensday (or Hensday; archaic form Hevenesdei) was the fifth day of the week in the Shire Calendar. It represented the Númenórean day Ormenel
After the reform of Isengrim Took II
column2: dates such as 1 June and 1 December always fell on Hevensday.

column1: Hevensday represents an archaic Hobbitish form "Hevenesdei"
column2: a word preserved in the Yellowskin.

column1: Hevensday is translated as "Wednesday" in The Lord of the Rings.
